atk-s0401a9:1: 81. Navamassāpi paṭhamaṁ aṭṭhuppattiyameva kathitaṁ. Sambahulā kira bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṁ nisinnā kumbhaghosakaṁ ārabbha ‘‘asukaṁ nāma kulaṁ pubbe appayasaṁ appaparivāraṁ ahosi, idāni mahāyasaṁ mahāparivāraṁ jāta’’nti kathayiṁsu. Satthā purimanayeneva āgantvā tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā imaṁ suttaṁ ārabhi. Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0401a9:2: 82. Dutiyādīsu mahato anatthāyāti mahantassa anatthassa atthāya. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
